text: Polozovo () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 269 as of 2010. There are 7 streets. == Geography == It is located 42 km south-west from Bolshaya Sosnova. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Polozovo
